Detailed Description

Test Mobileer Memory Heap.

Author:
Phil Burk, Copyright 2005 Mobileer, PROPRIETARY and CONFIDENTIAL
Allocate and reallocate memory blocks.

Note; this test requires that the compiler variable SPMIDI_USE_INTERNAL_MEMHEAP be defined as (1)
